name: auto-tab-groups-chrome
description: This is a lightweight Chrome extension that automatically groups open tabs by domain.

scripts.build: cd src && zip -r ../auto-tab-groups-chrome.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' 'web-ext-artifacts/*' && echo 'Chrome extension built: auto-tab-groups-chrome.zip'
scripts.dev: echo 'Load the src/ folder as unpacked extension in Chrome developer mode'
